title: Calories in Garlic
meta_description: Learn calories in garlic per clove and 100g, with full nutrition facts on carbs, protein, fat, and tips for use in recipes.
assumptions: Raw, medium clove (~3g), peeled; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by clove size, variety, freshness, and preparation. Values are approximate; check sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium raw garlic clove has about 4 calories and 1g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one clove of garlic?
faqs.a: About 4 calories for a medium raw clove.

faqs.q: What is the calorie count for 100g of garlic?

faqs.a: Yes, roughly 0.2g protein per medium clove.
Yes, about 1g carbs per clove, mostly complex.

faqs.q: How does cooking garlic affect its calories?
faqs.a: Minimal impact alone, but added oils or butter increase calories significantly.
